aboutSection.title: About Me
aboutSection.description: I'm a sushi chef with a passion for Japanese cuisine and modern culinary technology. I've worked in Europe's finest restaurants and now share my expertise.

journey.title: My Journey
journey.content: I've dedicated my life to mastering the art of sushi and Japanese cuisine. With years of experience working in top restaurants across Europe, I've developed a deep understanding of both traditional techniques and modern culinary innovation.

mission.title: Mission
mission.content: Through this blog, I share my knowledge and passion for Japanese cuisine, helping aspiring chefs and food enthusiasts master the art of sushi and understand the technology behind modern kitchens.
